overview: After years of harboring a secret, Colby Taylor decides to tell his best friend Travis Wade that he is gay. He invites him to come home and the two chums reminisce about the past, even talking about Colby's hot night with a blonde cupcake he was dating. Colby confesses that absolutely nothing happened with her, but that evening turned out to be quite an eye-opening turn-on for him.
title: The Crush
